content:
bors posted comments like this: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-clippy/pull/6038#issuecomment-692607931
But currently, changing labels through rustbot doesn't work as it is not configured.
cc @simulacrum
Someone could configure it, I guess - up to clippy team

Yes it works, just need "S-*" added here: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-clippy/blob/74051c4d4b4e0359982407bb846eeebaf6fa9cb9/triagebot.toml#L3

(I'll do it)
